Name: NewKSLog
Description: Create a new log file and retrieve event log codes.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Close-KSLog
Description: Close an existing log file.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Compare-KSArray
Description: Compares two arrays to determine equality.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertFrom-KSTokenString
Description: Convert from a token string to an object.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertFrom-KSXPathNode
Description: Convert from an XPathDocumentNavigator node-set to the specified type.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertTo-KSByte
Description: Converts a value to a byte array.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertTo-KSString
Description: Converts a byte array to a string value.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertTo-KSTokenString
Description: Convert an object to string of text tokens; property/value pairs.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertTo-KSType
Description: Convert a value to a named type.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: ConvertTo-KSXml
Description: Convert an object to a simple XML structure.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSCommandParameters
Description: Get the parameters used by a command, excluding common parameters.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSEventLogCode
Description: Get event log codes used by KScript scripts or modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSHash
Description: Get a hash for the requested object.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSLog
Description: Get active log files within the current session.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSModule
Description: Get a list of available KScript.* modules from the local system.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSSetting
Description: Get global settings used by KScript modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSSMTPConfiguration
Description: Get SMTP configuration for the script from the global configuration resource.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSTextResource
Description: Get text-based shared resources.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Install-KSModule
Description: Installs or updates KScript.* modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: New-KSDynamicModuleBuilder
Description: Creates a new assembly and a dynamic module within the current AppDomain.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: New-KSDynamicParameter
Description: Create a new dynamic parameter object for use with a dynamicparam block.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: New-KSEnum
Description: Creates a new enum (System.Enum) from a hashtable using an existing dynamic module.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: New-KSXPathNavigator
Description: Create a new XPathNavigator.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Remove-KSEventLogCode
Description: Remove a set of saved event log codes.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Remove-KSSetting
Description: Remove a global setting for KScript modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Set-KSEventLogCode
Description: Set event log codes for use by a handle.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Set-KSSetting
Description: Set a setting for KScript modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Set-KSXPathAttribute
Description: Set an attribute using the XPathNavigator object.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Start-KSAutoUpdate
Description: Start an update process for all installed KScript.* modules.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Start-KSLogRotate
Description: Start rotating log files.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Update-KSPropertyOrder
Description: Update the order of properties on an object.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Write-KSLog
Description: Write a message to the event log or a log file (or both).
Author: Chris Dent
